lines.text: If the international finance - Jewry inside and outside Europe - should succeed in plunging the nations into a world war yet again, then the outcome will not be the victory of Jewry, but rather the annihilation of the Jewish race in Europe!
This is not a religion - it's a conspiracy against all non-Jews by a sick, deceitful, poisoned race against the Aryan peoples and their moral laws.
The relativity-Jew Einstein, who concealed his hatred of Germany behind an obscure pseudo-science.
The Torah scroll is rolled to the place to be read. What sort of "truths" does it teach?
